Docs.param: An that can provide additional context information.
The regular expression object whose value is to be edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the given regular expression object using the given service provider and context.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object hasn't changed, this method returns the same object it received.
